metadata.description: Angelica Blackstone is half-vampire, half-god, and she has a hell of a lot of aggression to work out. Hellchild: The Unholy is a roller coaster ride through the horror that dwells under society. From human sacrifice to reptilian gods to the dark and demonic powers hiding within seemingly everyday people, join the team that brought you Robyn Hood and Van Helsing for the darkest hero in the Grimm Universe!
metadata.name: Hellchild: The Unholy
